column2:
"That was incredible!
<%me>!
I was glued to the monitor!"

"Oh, right, I already said that. But I really
meant it, so don't be surprised if I keep
repeating myself!"

"Anyway, you were dead on when you
decided to smack it down right there."
"You even got me wanting to give it a try now!"
"Don't try and stop me! But make sure you watch!"
